channel.title: Few Questions
channel.description:
Hi, I recently created a server. I is off the source of Testscape. How do I change ALL the things that say "Testscape" to my server's name?
~ And how do I change the text that appears as you log on?
~ And also, how do I change the commands, and what outfit you start out with?
~And my last question is how do I change some things I edited. I edited my stat levels to all "1" and it stayed the same what do I do?
Thanks for the help!!!!!!!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 12, 2008, 02:46:54 PM[/size][hr]P.S. I'm new at making servers... so don't treat me stupidly if some of the questions are semi-stupid.

item.title: Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @xtgscott xtgscott
item.description:
@xtgscott wrote:

Log out on your account. Then change the stats to that. But make it like, 14,000,000,000. Then log back in.

Read full topic

item.title: Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @_RoxMySox ~RoxMySox~
item.description:
@_RoxMySox wrote:

Thanks!

I changed all my skills to 99 and xp to 14,000,000 and… went on to my account that I edited. It still had the same stats. How can I refresh the changes made to my server…

THANKS!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @xtgscott xtgscott
item.description:
@xtgscott wrote:

  1. If you mean the welcome screen, go to client.java and search what it says and change the words to what you like.

  2. To change the command names go into Client.java and search “commandnamehere” and change the name.
    (where it says “commandnamehere” put the name of your command that your changing.
    To change your starting items, go into Player.java and do ctrl + F and search //Giving the player an unique look -1 means no item there.

  3. To change your starts, either use ::master, if you have that command or go into your character files, find your name, and go to [SKILLS] change all the 1’s to 99 and the exp to 140000000

Read full topic
